function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear unobserved positive rate among asymptomatic children","Impact":"Misestimate of contagious disease spread in children","Mitigation":"Implement widespread testing for asymptomatic children","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, PCR tests","People":"Asymptomatic children","Owner":"Health authorities, testing facilities"}]}
